import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' const UserEditProfile = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() //const user = useSelector (s =>s.user) const token = useSelector(s => s.user && s.user.token) const [ user, setUser ] = useState() if (!user) return 'Loading...' const handleField = field => e => setUser({ ...user, [field]: e.target.value }) const handleSave = e => { e.preventDefault() fetch('http://localhost:3300/user/profile/edit', { method: 'PUT', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + token }, body: JSON.stringify(user) }) .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => { alert('Guardado correctamente!') dispatch({ type: 'user', user: data }) }) .catch(() => alert('Error guardando...')) } return (

Editar perfil

) } export default UserEditProfile
